t: Amazon Fresh needs to find its identity
s: March 9, 2025 - When the concept opened they were trying to reduce labor at checkout. At the same time they put in (and mercifully closed) full-service, labor intensive meat and seafood departments. Amazon became successful being an innovator offering better buying options for buying goods. It looks like Fresh was started as a follower in a low-margin, highly competitive industry where they have no advantage on buying the branded ...

t: Buyer Returned a Used Item - Where do I stand
